home.heroTitle: Find the Benefits Your Family Deserves
home.heroDescription: A free, private tool that helps families of people with intellectual and developmental disabilities understand and access Medicaid, waiver programs, SSI/SSDI, SNAP, and more.
home.noAccountNote: No account required · Takes about 5 minutes
home.howItWorksSubtitle: Three simple steps to understand your options and take action.
home.step1Desc: Tell us about your family, income, and insurance situation through a simple guided questionnaire.
home.step2Desc: Get personalized results showing which benefit programs match your family's situation, with plain-language explanations.
home.step3Desc: Receive step-by-step action plans, document checklists, and connections to local organizations that can help.
home.programsSubtitle: We screen for the major benefit programs available to families nationwide.
home.trustSubtitle: We built this tool with the same care we'd want for our own families.
home.trustPrivateDesc: Your data is encrypted and never sold. Screen anonymously without an account.
home.trustExpertDesc: Eligibility rules are curated by benefits specialists, not guessed by AI.
home.trustPersonDesc: Built with dignity and respect for people with disabilities and their families.
home.ctaSubtitle: Now serving families in all 50 states. Select your state to get started.
home.medicaidDesc: Health coverage based on income and disability
